feed.title: SiYuan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Support Windows arm64 and Linux arm64
entry.content:
Overview

This version supports Windows arm64 and Linux arm64, improves web clipping, fixes some defects, and improves many details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Dock icon support drag
  • Improve the handling of empty input of query criteria
  • Add deb release package for Linux
  • Display database superscript icon on mobile
  • Disable Ctrl+D in read-only mode
  • Improve HTML h clipping
  • Improve HTML strong clipping
  • Support Windows arm64
  • Support Linux arm64
  • Improve importing Markdown folder
  • Improve pasting nearby some inline elements
  • Improve rollback doc file history
  • Improve Enter outdent after adjusting image size in the list
  • Improve the block fold icon button in the backlink panel
  • Add confirm dialog for Restore Default Layout
  • Improve untitled doc placeholder
  • The browser extension supports Wikipedia formula clipping
  • The User Guide is no longer opened repeatedly when multiple windows exist
  • Improve pasting in code block
  • Improve Expand Down/Up keymaps on Windows
  • Improve HTML img clipping
  • Improve HTML math clipping
  • Do not clip the Edit element next to Wikipedia headings
  • Improve task list redo
  • Add an internal kernel API /api/av/appendAttributeViewDetachedBlocksWithValues
  • Static compile for Linux desktop kernel
  • Improve database handling when importing .sy.zip
  • Improve table parsing

Bugfix

  • The exception occurs in the Settings - About on the Microsoft Store edition
  • The request of PWA files without Authentication Header
  • The primary key sorting of the database panel fails in some cases
  • Optimize typography causes HTML blocks in the list to become invalid
  • Database entries cannot be reordered in some cases

Document

  • Add Japanese user guide

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Support read-only publish service
entry.content:
Overview

This version supports read-only publish service, improves web clipping, fixes some defects, and improves many details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Feature

  • Support read-only publish service

Enhancement

  • Improve interactive guidance after creating an empty doc
  • Improve menu interaction with inline elements
  • Improve performance for unfolding headings
  • Improve PDF exporting
  • Keep the width when duplicating database table view field
  • Improve HTML entity clipping
  • Improve duplicating for a doc with databases
  • Improve list item end deletion
  • Improve HTML tag input
  • Attribute Panel - Database supports right-click on the field
  • The conversion list supports configuring shortcut keys
  • Improve Ctrl+P and Ctrl+F
  • Improve Wikipedia clipping
  • Improve HTML code clipping
  • Improve web clip escaping code block markers
  • Improve Add to Database search
  • Improve StackExchange formula clipping
  • Improve cursor moving in the code block
  • Display the "Closed notebook" count in the doc tree panel
  • Windows arm64 and Linux arm64 no longer packing pandoc
  • Improve Zhihu formula clipping
  • Display database title in bookmark panel
  • Improve Mermaid's Markdown rendering
  • Improve Shift+↑/↓ selection
  • Improve the position of open documents in split screen
  • Paste a block at the beginning and insert it above
  • Remove invisible characters from file names when uploading assets
  • Improve custom emoji rendering on mobile
  • Improve ↑/↓ moving in the table
  • Display details when exporting .sy.zip and data.zip
  • No prompt when pressing the auxiliary key in the shortcut key setting
  • Improve embed blocks exporting
  • Improve use of ↓ in doc titles
  • Disable some menu items in read-only mode
  • Improve inline elements pasting
  • Improve HTML formula clipping
  • Custom Emoji folders no longer require manual refresh when they change
  • Improve the selection operation after the image is centered
  • Add "Copy" to the right-click menu of a PDF tab
  • Improve multiple selection for blocks containing images
  • Improve emoji search
  • Improve page number for exporting PDF annotation hyperlinks
  • Improve HTML table clipping
  • Export block ref Anchor hash supports doc-level
  • Improve font family
  • Reindex notebook and reload UI after data sync if notebook conf changed

Bugfix

  • Moving a child block of a super block is abnormal
  • When editing in multiple windows, the doc cannot be opened normally in a new window
  • Add to Database is not available on mobile
  • HTML block drag and undo will show tag
  • Failed to rename the document after moving it
  • Repeat the escaped content of the image title
  • IFrame block does not resize when adaptive width is enabled
  • Inline memo with % cannot be displayed
  • Shift+Enter does not work properly in inline elements
  • Paste escaped text exception inside inline level code
  • AI custom action can't be edited
  • Using Ctrl+X on an embed block should cut the embed block itself
  • Sometimes the audio or video does not play
  • Search UI XSS
  • Code block language search XSS

Document

  • Improve user guide type filtering chapter

Refactor

  • Upgrade mermaid to v10.9.1
  • Upgrade to Electron v31.1.0
  • Refactor the blocktree storage

Development

  • Kernel API OCR returns text coordinate information
  • Add internal kernel API /api/attr/batchGetBlockAttrs

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Fix bugs
entry.content:
Overview

This version mainly improves performance and fixes an issue where data syncing could not be performed on some devices.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve database asset field exporting
  • Improve spaced repetition loading performance
  • Improve embed block exporting
  • Improve database text field exporting
  • The images in the databases are not uploaded to the community hosting
  • Improve block ref searching performance
  • Improve recent docs loading performance
  • Support find replace block ref anchor text

Bugfix

  • After changing the History Retention Days, the file history cannot be displayed
  • Data syncing not working on some devices
  • Non-desktop ends cannot export Markdown
  • Abnormal heading block update time

Refactor

  • Upgrade to Electron v31.2.1

Development

  • Fixed the issue of WebSocket asynchronous initialization

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve web page clipping
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves web page clipping, fixes some bugs and improves some details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve HTML code clipping
  • The database-bound block is automatically added to the database after being copied as a replica
  • Improve database template field exporting
  • Improve block ref anchor text exporting
  • Improve outline panel escape rendering
  • Improve block ref searching
  • Improve HTML code block clipping
  • Improve HTML kbd clipping
  • Improve emoji charsets
  • Supports converting network assets in the database to local
  • Improve database date filed sorting

Bugfix

  • Abnormal heading block update time
  • After setting search, About disappears
  • Exporting embedded heading blocks without blocks underneath
  • Dragging an embedded block in a superblock causes the embedded block to be duplicated

Refactor

  • Upgrade to Electron v31.3.1

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Fix bugs
entry.content:
Overview

This version fixes some detail defects, it is recommended to upgrade.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Improve sort when importing markdown files
  • The marketplacepackage supports author name search
  • Improve indexing completeness when exiting
  • The database-bound block is automatically added to the database after being copied as a replica
  • Improve processing when a database-bound block changes its type
  • Improve sub/sup pasting as plain text
  • Publish service prohibit find-replace
  • Ignore hidden files when cleaning unused assets
  • Improve block update time filling
  • Improve data repo key importing
  • Block ref dynamic anchor text no longer contains escape char

Bugfix

  • The drop-down menu in the macOS settings is invalid
  • After opening the search results, the split screen cannot load the complete content
  • The asset creation time and update time are displayed in reverse order

Refactor

  • Downgrade to Electron v30.3.1

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub
